original_text: He hath made the earth by his power, he hath established the world by his wisdom, and hath stretched out the heaven by his understanding.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 능력으로 땅을 지으셨고 그의 지혜로 세계를 세우셨고 그의 명철로 하늘들을 펴셨으며

sentences.original_text: He hath made earth by his power
he hath established world by his wisdom
and hath stretched out heaven by his understanding
